data.name: Feiyun Study Room
data.description: There are many ways to fashion a study in Liyue, but luxury is optional, for the learned prefer "spirit" and "elegance." A potted plant here balances out the moisture in the room, and the table and shelves exude a light woody fragrance that combines with the plain layout and the sunset glow of the lamps to inspire genius and elevate writing.\nThey say that many years ago, a certain guest at Feiyun Slope laid just such a study out, and this design was taken up by the previous boss of Wanwen Bookhouse. Thus, it was ever after known as the Feiyun Study Room and became recognized throughout Liyue.

text.text: All of these rare books... many of them can hardly be found at Wanwen Bookhouse, or even in all of Liyue.
Ahem... If I may so ask, where do you usually collect your literature? Perhaps you could share a tip or two with a friend, my liege...?
The books here are considered quite rare. And those material catalogs from Mondstadt, hmm... perhaps they might provide some competitive market advantage.
If I had to say one thing, it would be that the decorations are a little simple. It wouldn't hurt to consider adding more... presentable articles of furniture.
The people of Liyue follow a multitude of rules when arranging the furniture in a study. These decorative arts can largely be organized into three schools of thought and nine areas of specialization.
You have never heard my explanations on the subject, and yet you still avoided every taboo.
Perhaps some tacit connection has formed between us during our journey together.
Hmm, would you look at that... the name of this room is the "Feiyun Study Room."
Its name contains the word "yun," just like my own name... It looks like I have a special connection with this room.
Haha, I'm kidding, of course. It is most definitely to my liking, though. Furnished with all the supplies one could possibly hope for in a study. I am truly grateful.
I can tell you've put a great deal of thought into decorating the study.

The potted plant in particular â€” it's refined and elegant in appearance, but still carries with it a subtle hint of the wilderness. For those who spend extended periods of time at their desk, it's no doubt a relaxing sight.
Taking care of the mind is an important part of healthy living. In that sense, the layout of your study is an ideal one.
